parameters.name: IgnoreSuppressed
parameters.description: True to ignore suppressed section lines, false to include them

title: IView.EnumSectionLines2
description: Gets the section lines enumeration in the view.

parameters.name: IgnoreSuppressed
parameters.description: True to ignore suppressed section lines, false to include them

remarks: This method returns section lines whether the view is visible or not. If the view is hidden, then the section lines are still returned.
